content.rendered:
Directed by Bramma G.. Anucharan Murugaiyan.

Written by Pushkar.

Cast Aishwarya Rajesh( Nandini). Shreya Reddy( Regina). Parthiban Radhakrishnan( Shanmugam). Prem Kumar( Vadivelu). Harish Uthaman( Trilok Vadde). Kumaravel( Guna). Indumathy Manikandan( Devi). Latha Rao( Selvi). Arun Pandiyan E( Muthu). Dev Abibullah( Rathnam). Gayas Hussain( Ansari). Sasi Kumar( Arivu). Nivedhithaa Sathish( Lakshmi). Gopika Ramesh( Nila). Palani Murugan( Eeshwaran). Velmurugan( Arunagiri). Santhana Bharathi( Kothandaraman). FJ( Adhisayam). Jeeva Subramanian( Kothai). Chandra( Pechiamma). Sowndharya( Malar). Venkatesan( Poosari). M. Anjamani( Poosari Team). S. Shanmugam( Poosari Team). Yusuf Hussain( Mukesh Vadde). Prasanna Balachandran( Sundaram). Navneeth Krishnan( Gani). Yashwanth babu A.S( Mani). Purushothaman( Dayalan). Murugan( Factory Worker). Abdul Sathar( Factory Worker). Vijayaragavan( Factory Worker). G. Ajith Kumar( Kandipan). Eashwari( Sakkarai’s Mom). S. Pavithra( Celine). Suvetha( Class Teacher). Nitish( Pushparaj). Ajith Koshy( DSP). Mona( Autopsy Doctor). Thenappan P.L.( Maniyar). Hareesh S.S( Dheena). R. Vijayanthi( Principal). Velu Aasaan Samar Kalai( Folk Instrument Musician). Avvai Shanmugam kalai Kuzhu( Folk Artist). Melody( Angalamman). Mekha Rajan( Doctor Sangamithra). Sunil Sai( Ashiq). Praveen( Maniyar’s Son). Rakesh R( Dheena Friend 1). Karthikeyan P( Dheena Friend 2). Jagadeesh R( Dheena Friend 3). Sowmya Mahendiran( Lakshmi’s Friend). Athira( Forensic Team #1). Suresh( Forensic Team #2). Naresh( Forensic Team #3). Balaji M.( Amar). Loganathan( Senior Doctor). Amarendran( Lawyer). Shanmugam Muthusamy( Autopsy Attender). S. Dhanalingam( Large Hardware Owner). Mohan Das( Munnar Police Constable). Charavarthy N( Small Hardware Owner unknow)

Languages Telugu. Kannada. Malayalam. Hindi. Tamil.

Producers Gayatri. S. Guhapriya. Kanish Prabhu. Pushkar. Gowtham Selvaraj. Nandakumar Srinivasan.

Production Wallwatcher Films.

Creator Gayatri. Pushkar.

Number of Seasons 1

Number of Episodes 8

Status OnGoing (2022–)
